sourcesContent:
import AltLayer from './assets/altlayer.webp'
import Astria from './assets/astria.webp'
import Caldera from './assets/caldera.webp'
import Conduit from './assets/conduit.webp'
import Gateway from './assets/gateway.webp'
import Gelato from './assets/gelato.webp'
import Karnot from './assets/karnot.webp'
import Lumoz from './assets/lumoz.webp'
import Snapchain from './assets/snapchain.webp'
import Vistara from './assets/vistara.webp'
import Zeeve from './assets/zeeve.webp'

const Framework = [
    {
        title: 'AltLayer',
        sub: 'We offer a versatile rollup stack including Arbitrum Orbit, OP stack, Polygon zkEVM and StarkWare.',
        stack: ['ARBITRUM ORBIT', 'OP STACK', 'POLYGON CDK'],
        logo: AltLayer
    },
    {
        title: 'Astria',
        sub: "Astria lets rollups share a single decentralized network of sequencers that's simple and permissionless to join.",
        stack: [],
        logo: Astria
    },
    {
        title: 'Caldera',
        sub: 'Caldera makes it easy to launch performant, customizable Arbitrum Orbit and OP Stack rollups. No code required.',
        stack: ['ARBITRUM ORBIT', 'OP STACK'],
        logo: Caldera
    },
    {
        title: 'Conduit',
        sub: 'Deploy a rollup in a few clicks, no code required. Fully-managed, production grade OP Stack and Arbitrum Orbit rollups on Ethereum.',
        stack: ['ARBITRUM ORBIT', 'OP STACK'],
        logo: Conduit
    },
    {
        title: 'Gateway',
        sub: 'Create your own zkEVM with all the infrastructure you need.',
        stack: ['POLYGON CDK'],
        logo: Gateway
    },
    {
        title: 'Gelato',
        sub: 'The all-in-one Ethereum Rollup as a Service Platform. Deploy production-grade & fully-serviced L2 rollups natively integrated with tools like oracles, bridges, data indexers and Account Abstraction.',
        stack: ['ARBITRUM ORBIT', 'OP STACK', 'POLYGON CDK'],
        logo: Gelato
    },
    {
        title: 'Karnot',
        sub: 'Karnot abstracts all the difficult parts of managing your own app chain so that you can build what really matters.',
        stack: ['STARKNET STACK'],
        logo: Karnot
    },
    {
        title: 'Lumoz',
        sub: 'A decentralized ZK-RaaS network featuring ZKP mining.',
        stack: ['POLYGON CDK'],
        logo: Lumoz
    },
    {
        title: 'Snapchain',
        sub: 'Leverage the power of ZK Rollups to scale your on-chain game or DeFi app cheaply and securely, without compromise.',
        stack: ['POLYGON CDK'],
        logo: Snapchain
    },
    {
        title: 'Vistara',
        sub: 'Vistara is building a Hardware availability layer for the modular web aiming to democratize access to decentralized hardware.',
        stack: [],
        logo: Vistara
    },
    {
        title: 'Zeeve',
        sub: 'Build, Customize, and Launch your production-grade Rollups with Zeeve’s Rollups as a Service (RaaS).',
        stack: ['ARBITRUM ORBIT', 'OP STACK', 'POLYGON CDK'],
        logo: Zeeve
    }
]

export default Framework
